scripts.test: node --test --test-reporter @currents/node-test-reporter --test-reporter-destination=./report.xml **.test.mjs || true && echo '✅ Script executed successfully'
scripts.test-2: node --test --test-reporter @currents/node-test-reporter-2 --test-reporter-destination=./report.xml **.test.mjs || true && echo '✅ Script executed successfully'
